blocks.name: isst
blocks.content: Property of a state. (Contributed by NM, 23-Oct-1999.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm isst(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cst), w3a(wf(c0, cch, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wceq(cfv(c0, chba), nat1), wral(s0, cch, wral(s1, cch, wi(wss(cv(s0), cfv(cort, cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), caddc, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wcel(c0, cst), w3a(wf(c0, cch, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wceq(cfv(c0, chba), nat1), wral(s0, cch, wral(s1, cch, wi(wss(cv(s0), cfv(cort, cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), caddc, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))))), wa(wcel(c0, co(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, cch)), wa(wceq(cfv(c0, chba), nat1), wral(s0, cch, wral(s1, cch, wi(wss(cv(s0), cfv(cort, cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), caddc, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))))))), wa(wf(c0, cch, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wa(wceq(cfv(c0, chba), nat1), wral(s0, cch, wral(s1, cch, wi(wss(cv(s0), cfv(cort, cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), caddc, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))))))))
  anbi1i(wcel(c0, co(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, cch)), wa(wceq(cfv(c0, chba), nat1), wral(s0, cch, wral(s1, cch, wi(wss(cv(s0), cfv(cort, cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), caddc, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))))), wf(c0, cch, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)))
  elmap(c0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cch)
  ovex(nat0, cicc, nat1)
  chex()
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cst, co(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, cch), wa(wceq(cfv(c0, chba), nat1), wral(s0, cch, wral(s1, cch, wi(wss(cv(s0), cfv(cort, cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), caddc, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))))), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), chba), nat1), wral(s0, cch, wral(s1, cch, wi(wss(cv(s0), cfv(cort, cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), chba), nat1), wral(s0, cch, wral(s1, cch, wi(wss(cv(s0), cfv(cort, cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))))), wceq(cfv(c0, chba), nat1), wral(s0, cch, wral(s1, cch, wi(wss(cv(s0), cfv(cort, cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), caddc, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))))))
  eqeq1d(cfv(cv(hs0), chba), nat1, cfv(c0, chba), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq1(cv(hs0), c0, chba)
  2ralbidv(s0, s1, cch, cch, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wi(wss(cv(s0), cfv(cort, cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))), wi(wss(cv(s0), cfv(cort, cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), caddc, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(s0), cfv(cort, cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), caddc, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))
  eqeq12d(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), caddc, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq1(cv(hs0), c0, co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1)))
  oveq12d(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))
  fveq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1))
  df-st(hs0, s0, s1)
  3anass(wf(c0, cch, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wceq(cfv(c0, chba), nat1), wral(s0, cch, wral(s1, cch, wi(wss(cv(s0), cfv(cort, cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), caddc, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, cch))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wceq(cfv(c0, chba), nat1), wral(s0, cch, wral(s1, cch, wi(wss(cv(s0), cfv(cort, cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), caddc, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

thm ishst(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wcel(c0, chst), w3a(wf(c0, cch, chba), wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, chba)), nat1), wral(s0, cch, wral(s1, cch, wi(wss(cv(s0), cfv(cort, cv(s1))), wa(wceq(co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csp, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), nat0), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cva, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))))))), wa(wcel(c0, co(chba, cmap, cch)), wa(wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, chba)), nat1), wral(s0, cch, wral(s1, cch, wi(wss(cv(s0), cfv(cort, cv(s1))), wa(wceq(co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csp, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), nat0), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cva, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))))))), wa(wf(c0, cch, chba), wa(wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, chba)), nat1), wral(s0, cch, wral(s1, cch, wi(wss(cv(s0), cfv(cort, cv(s1))), wa(wceq(co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csp, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), nat0), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cva, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))))))))
  anbi1i(wcel(c0, co(chba, cmap, cch)), wa(wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, chba)), nat1), wral(s0, cch, wral(s1, cch, wi(wss(cv(s0), cfv(cort, cv(s1))), wa(wceq(co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csp, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), nat0), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cva, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))))))), wf(c0, cch, chba))
  elmap(c0, chba, cch)
  ax-hilex()
  chex()
  elrab2(hs0, c0, chst, co(chba, cmap, cch), wa(wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, chba)), nat1), wral(s0, cch, wral(s1, cch, wi(wss(cv(s0), cfv(cort, cv(s1))), wa(wceq(co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csp, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), nat0), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cva, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))))))), wa(wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(cv(hs0), chba)), nat1), wral(s0, cch, wral(s1, cch, wi(wss(cv(s0), cfv(cort, cv(s1))), wa(wceq(co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), csp, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), nat0), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cva, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(cv(hs0), chba)), nat1), wral(s0, cch, wral(s1, cch, wi(wss(cv(s0), cfv(cort, cv(s1))), wa(wceq(co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), csp, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), nat0), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cva, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))))), wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, chba)), nat1), wral(s0, cch, wral(s1, cch, wi(wss(cv(s0), cfv(cort, cv(s1))), wa(wceq(co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csp, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), nat0), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cva, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))))))
  fveqeq2d(cno, cfv(cv(hs0), chba), nat1, cfv(c0, chba), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq1(cv(hs0), c0, chba)
  2ralbidv(s0, s1, cch, cch, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wi(wss(cv(s0), cfv(cort, cv(s1))), wa(wceq(co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), csp, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), nat0), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cva, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))), wi(wss(cv(s0), cfv(cort, cv(s1))), wa(wceq(co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csp, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), nat0), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cva, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(s0), cfv(cort, cv(s1))), wa(wceq(co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), csp, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), nat0), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cva, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))), wa(wceq(co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csp, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), nat0), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cva, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), csp, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), nat0), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cva, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))), wceq(co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csp, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), nat0), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cva, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))
  eqeq1d(co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), csp, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), nat0, co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csp, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq12d(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), csp, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  eqeq12d(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cva, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cva, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq1(cv(hs0), c0, co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1)))
  oveq12d(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cva, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))
  fveq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1))
  df-hst(hs0, s0, s1)
  3anass(wf(c0, cch, chba), wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, chba)), nat1), wral(s0, cch, wral(s1, cch, wi(wss(cv(s0), cfv(cort, cv(s1))), wa(wceq(co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csp, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), nat0), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cva, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(chba, cmap, cch))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, chba)), nat1), wral(s0, cch, wral(s1, cch, wi(wss(cv(s0), cfv(cort, cv(s1))), wa(wceq(co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csp, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), nat0), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), chj, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cva, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))))))))

blocks.origin:
thm hstel2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, chst), wcel(c1, cch)), wa(wcel(c2, cch), wss(c1, cfv(cort, c2)))), wa(wceq(co(cfv(c0, c1), csp, cfv(c0, c2)), nat0), wceq(cfv(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)), co(cfv(c0, c1), cva, cfv(c0, c2)))))
} = {
  mpd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, chst), wcel(c1, cch)), wa(wcel(c2, cch), wss(c1, cfv(cort, c2)))), wa(wceq(co(cfv(c0, c1), csp, cfv(c0, c2)), nat0), wceq(cfv(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)), co(cfv(c0, c1), cva, cfv(c0, c2)))), wral(hs0, cch, wral(hs1, cch, wi(wss(cv(hs0), cfv(cort, cv(hs1))), wa(wceq(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), csp, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), nat0), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), chj, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cva, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))))))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, chst), wcel(c1, cch), wa(wcel(c2, cch), wss(c1, cfv(cort, c2))), wral(hs0, cch, wral(hs1, cch, wi(wss(cv(hs0), cfv(cort, cv(hs1))), wa(wceq(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), csp, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), nat0), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), chj, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cva, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))))))
  simp3bi(wcel(c0, chst), wral(hs0, cch, wral(hs1, cch, wi(wss(cv(hs0), cfv(cort, cv(hs1))), wa(wceq(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), csp, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), nat0), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), chj, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cva, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))))), wf(c0, cch, chba), wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, chba)), nat1))
  ishst(hs0, hs1, c0)
  adantll(wcel(c0, chst), wcel(c1, cch), wa(wcel(c2, cch), wss(c1, cfv(cort, c2))), wi(wral(hs0, cch, wral(hs1, cch, wi(wss(cv(hs0), cfv(cort, cv(hs1))), wa(wceq(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), csp, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), nat0), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), chj, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cva, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))))), wa(wceq(co(cfv(c0, c1), csp, cfv(c0, c2)), nat0), wceq(cfv(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)), co(cfv(c0, c1), cva, cfv(c0, c2))))))

thm hst1h(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CHStates ∧ c1 ∈ CH)→((normh `(c0 ` c1))= 1 ↔(c0 ` c1)=(c0 ` ~H)))
} = {
  impbida((c0 ∈ CHStates ∧ c1 ∈ CH), (normh `(c0 ` c1))= 1, (c0 ` c1)=(c0 ` ~H))
  eqtr3d((c0 ` c1), (c0 ` ~H), ((c0 ` c1)[+h]0h), ((c0 ∈ CHStates ∧ c1 ∈ CH)∧(normh `(c0 ` c1))= 1))
  adantr((c0 ∈ CHStates ∧ c1 ∈ CH), (normh `(c0 ` c1))= 1, ((c0 ` c1)[+h]0h)=(c0 ` c1))
  syl((c0 ∈ CHStates ∧ c1 ∈ CH), ((c0 ` c1)[+h]0h)=(c0 ` c1), (c0 ` c1)∈ ~H)
  hstcl(c0, c1)
  ax-hvaddid((c0 ` c1))
  eqtr3d(((c0 ` c1)[+h]0h), (c0 ` ~H), ((c0 ` c1)[+h](c0 `(_|_ ` c1))), ((c0 ∈ CHStates ∧ c1 ∈ CH)∧(normh `(c0 ` c1))= 1))
  oveq2d((c0 ` c1), cva, (c0 `(_|_ ` c1)), c0v, ((c0 ∈ CHStates ∧ c1 ∈ CH)∧(normh `(c0 ` c1))= 1))
  imp((c0 ∈ CHStates ∧ c1 ∈ CH), (normh `(c0 ` c1))= 1, (c0 `(_|_ ` c1))= 0h)
  sylibd((c0 ∈ CHStates ∧ c1 ∈ CH), (normh `(c0 ` c1))= 1, (c0 `(_|_ ` c1))= 0h, ((normh `(c0 `(_|_ ` c1)))[^]2)= 0)
  ex((c0 ∈ CHStates ∧ c1 ∈ CH), (normh `(c0 ` c1))= 1, ((normh `(c0 `(_|_ ` c1)))[^]2)= 0)
  syl6eq(((normh `(c0 `(_|_ ` c1)))[^]2), nat0, (1[-]1), ((c0 ∈ CHStates ∧ c1 ∈ CH)∧(normh `(c0 ` c1))= 1))
  eqtr3d(((normh `(c0 `(_|_ ` c1)))[^]2), (1[-]1), ((1[+]((normh `(c0 `(_|_ ` c1)))[^]2))[-]1), ((c0 ∈ CHStates ∧ c1 ∈ CH)∧(normh `(c0 ` c1))= 1))
  adantr((c0 ∈ CHStates ∧ c1 ∈ CH), (normh `(c0 ` c1))= 1, ((1[+]((normh `(c0 `(_|_ ` c1)))[^]2))[-]1)=((normh `(c0 `(_|_ ` c1)))[^]2))
  sylancr((c0 ∈ CHStates ∧ c1 ∈ CH), ((1[+]((normh `(c0 `(_|_ ` c1)))[^]2))[-]1)=((normh `(c0 `(_|_ ` c1)))[^]2), 1 ∈ ℂ, ((normh `(c0 `(_|_ ` c1)))[^]2)∈ ℂ)
  ax-1cn()
  recnd(((normh `(c0 `(_|_ ` c1)))[^]2), (c0 ∈ CHStates ∧ c1 ∈ CH))
  resqcld((normh `(c0 `(_|_ ` c1))), (c0 ∈ CHStates ∧ c1 ∈ CH))
  pncan2(nat1, ((normh `(c0 `(_|_ ` c1)))[^]2))
  oveq1d((1[+]((normh `(c0 `(_|_ ` c1)))[^]2)), cmin, nat1, nat1, ((c0 ∈ CHStates ∧ c1 ∈ CH)∧(normh `(c0 ` c1))= 1))
  sylan9eqr((1[+]((normh `(c0 `(_|_ ` c1)))[^]2)), nat1, (((normh `(c0 ` c1))[^]2)[+]((normh `(c0 `(_|_ ` c1)))[^]2)), (c0 ∈ CHStates ∧ c1 ∈ CH), (normh `(c0 ` c1))= 1)
  oveq1d(nat1, caddc, ((normh `(c0 `(_|_ ` c1)))[^]2), ((normh `(c0 ` c1))[^]2), (normh `(c0 ` c1))= 1)
  syl6req(nat1, ((normh `(c0 ` c1))[^]2), (1[^]2), (normh `(c0 ` c1))= 1)
  oveq1((normh `(c0 ` c1)), nat1, cexp, nat2)
  sq1()
  hstnmoc(c0, c1)
  1m1e0()
  bitrd((c0 ∈ CHStates ∧ c1 ∈ CH), ((normh `(c0 `(_|_ ` c1)))[^]2)= 0, (c0 `(_|_ ` c1))= 0h, (normh `(c0 `(_|_ ` c1)))= 0)
  syl((c0 ∈ CHStates ∧ c1 ∈ CH), (((normh `(c0 `(_|_ ` c1)))[^]2)= 0 ↔(normh `(c0 `(_|_ ` c1)))= 0), (normh `(c0 `(_|_ ` c1)))∈ ℂ)
  recnd((normh `(c0 `(_|_ ` c1))), (c0 ∈ CHStates ∧ c1 ∈ CH))

blocks.name: hstles
blocks.content: Ordering property of a Hilbert-space-valued state. (Contributed by NM, 30-Jun-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

  eqbrtrrd(nat1, cle, cfv(cno, cfv(c0, c2)), cfv(cno, cfv(c0, c1)), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, chst), wcel(c1, cch)), wa(wcel(c2, cch), wss(c1, c2))), wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, c1)), nat1)))
  simpr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, chst), wcel(c1, cch)), wa(wcel(c2, cch), wss(c1, c2))), wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, c1)), nat1))

} = {

  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
} = {
  impbid1(c0 ∈ States, 1[≤](c0 ` c1), (c0 ` c1)= 1)
  sylibrd(c0 ∈ States, 1[≤](c0 ` c1), (c0 ` c1)= 1, ((c0 ` c1)[≤]1 ∧ 1[≤](c0 ` c1)))
  ex(c0 ∈ States, 1[≤](c0 ` c1), ((c0 ` c1)[≤]1 ∧ 1[≤](c0 ` c1)))
  anim1i(c0 ∈ States, 1[≤](c0 ` c1), (c0 ` c1)[≤]1)
  mpi(c0 ∈ States, (c0 ` c1)[≤]1, c1 ∈ CH)
  stle1(c0, c1)
  sylancl(c0 ∈ States, ((c0 ` c1)= 1 ↔((c0 ` c1)[≤]1 ∧ 1[≤](c0 ` c1))), (c0 ` c1)∈ ℝ, 1 ∈ ℝ)
  mpi(c0 ∈ States, (c0 ` c1)∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ CH)
  stcl(c0, c1)
  1re()
  letri3((c0 ` c1), nat1)
  mpbiri((c0 ` c1)= 1, 1[≤](c0 ` c1), 1[≤]1)
  1le1()
  breq2((c0 ` c1), nat1, nat1, cle)
}

blocks.name: stle0i
blocks.content: If a state is less than or equal to 0, it is 0. (Contributed by NM, 11-Nov-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm stle0i(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cst), wb(wbr(cfv(c0, c1), cle, nat0), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat0)))
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
} = {
  impbid1(wcel(c0, cst), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), cle, nat0), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat0))
  sylibrd(wcel(c0, cst), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), cle, nat0), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat0), wa(wbr(cfv(c0, c1), cle, nat0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c0, c1))))
  expcom(wcel(c0, cst), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), cle, nat0), wa(wbr(cfv(c0, c1), cle, nat0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c0, c1))))
  anim2i(wbr(cfv(c0, c1), cle, nat0), wcel(c0, cst), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c0, c1)))
  mpi(wcel(c0, cst), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c0, c1)), wcel(c1, cch))
  stge0(c0, c1)
  sylancl(wcel(c0, cst), wb(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat0), wa(wbr(cfv(c0, c1), cle, nat0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c0, c1)))), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cr), wcel(nat0, cr))
  mpi(wcel(c0, cst), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cr), wcel(c1, cch))
  stcl(c0, c1)
  0re()
  letri3(cfv(c0, c1), nat0)
  mpbiri(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat0), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), cle, nat0), wbr(nat0, cle, nat0))
  0le0()
  breq1(cfv(c0, c1), nat0, cle, nat0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm stle0i(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ States →((c0 ` c1)[≤]0 ↔(c0 ` c1)= 0))
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
} = {

  mpi(c0 ∈ States, 0[≤](c0 ` c1), c1 ∈ CH)
  stge0(c0, c1)
  sylancl(c0 ∈ States, ((c0 ` c1)= 0 ↔((c0 ` c1)[≤]0 ∧ 0[≤](c0 ` c1))), (c0 ` c1)∈ ℝ, 0 ∈ ℝ)
  mpi(c0 ∈ States, (c0 ` c1)∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ CH)
  stcl(c0, c1)
  0re()
  letri3((c0 ` c1), nat0)

blocks.name: stlei
blocks.content: Ordering law for states. (Contributed by NM, 24-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm stlei(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cst), wi(wss(c1, c2), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), cle, cfv(c0, c2))))
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| wcel(c2, cch)
} = {
  ex(wcel(c0, cst), wss(c1, c2), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), cle, cfv(c0, c2)))
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, cst), wss(c1, c2)), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), cle, cfv(c0, c2)), wbr(co(cfv(c0, c1), caddc, cfv(c0, cfv(cort, c2))), cle, co(cfv(c0, c2), caddc, cfv(c0, cfv(cort, c2)))))
  eqbrtrrd(co(cfv(c0, c1), caddc, cfv(c0, cfv(cort, c2))), cle, co(cfv(c0, c2), caddc, cfv(c0, cfv(cort, c2))), cfv(c0, co(c1, chj, cfv(cort, c2))), wa(wcel(c0, cst), wss(c1, c2)))
  imp(wcel(c0, cst), wss(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(c0, co(c1, chj, cfv(cort, c2))), co(cfv(c0, c1), caddc, cfv(c0, cfv(cort, c2)))))
  syl5(wcel(c0, cst), wss(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(c0, co(c1, chj, cfv(cort, c2))), co(cfv(c0, c1), caddc, cfv(c0, cfv(cort, c2)))), wa(wa(wcel(c1, cch), wcel(cfv(cort, c2), cch)), wss(c1, cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c2)))))
  jctil(wss(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, cch), wcel(cfv(cort, c2), cch)), wss(c1, cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c2))))
  mpi(wss(c1, c2), wss(c1, cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c2))), wss(c2, cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c2))))
  ax-mp(wss(c2, cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c2))), wcel(c2, csh))
  chshii(c2)
  shococss(c2)
  sstr2(c1, c2, cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c2)))
  pm3.2i(wcel(c1, cch), wcel(cfv(cort, c2), cch))
  stj(c0, c1, cfv(cort, c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cst), wss(c1, c2), wbr(cfv(c0, co(c1, chj, cfv(cort, c2))), cle, co(cfv(c0, c2), caddc, cfv(c0, cfv(cort, c2)))))
  breqtrrd(cfv(c0, co(c1, chj, cfv(cort, c2))), cle, co(cfv(c0, c2), caddc, cfv(c0, cfv(cort, c2))), nat1, wcel(c0, cst))
  mpi(wcel(c0, cst), wbr(cfv(c0, co(c1, chj, cfv(cort, c2))), cle, nat1), wcel(co(c1, chj, cfv(cort, c2)), cch))
  chjcli(c1, cfv(cort, c2))
  stle1(c0, co(c1, chj, cfv(cort, c2)))
  sto1i(c0, c2)
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cst), wss(c1, c2)), wb(wbr(cfv(c0, c1), cle, cfv(c0, c2)), wbr(co(cfv(c0, c1), caddc, cfv(c0, cfv(cort, c2))), cle, co(cfv(c0, c2), caddc, cfv(c0, cfv(cort, c2))))), w3a(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cr), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), cr), wcel(cfv(c0, cfv(cort, c2)), cr)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cst), wss(c1, c2), w3a(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cr), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), cr), wcel(cfv(c0, cfv(cort, c2)), cr)))
  3jca(wcel(c0, cst), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cr), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), cr), wcel(cfv(c0, cfv(cort, c2)), cr))
  mpi(wcel(c0, cst), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cr), wcel(c1, cch))
  stcl(c0, c1)
  mpi(wcel(c0, cst), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), cr), wcel(c2, cch))
  stcl(c0, c2)
  mpi(wcel(c0, cst), wcel(cfv(c0, cfv(cort, c2)), cr), wcel(cfv(cort, c2), cch))
  choccli(c2)
  stcl(c0, cfv(cort, c2))
  leadd1(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, cfv(cort, c2)))
}

blocks.name: stlesi
blocks.content: Ordering law for states. (Contributed by NM, 24-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm stlesi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cst), wi(wss(c1, c2), wi(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat1))))
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| wcel(c2, cch)
} = {
  exp32(wcel(c0, cst), wss(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat1))
  mpbir2and(wa(wcel(c0, cst), wa(wss(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1))), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat1), wbr(cfv(c0, c2), cle, nat1), wbr(nat1, cle, cfv(c0, c2)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cst), wa(wss(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1)), wbr(cfv(c0, c2), cle, nat1))
  mpi(wcel(c0, cst), wbr(cfv(c0, c2), cle, nat1), wcel(c2, cch))
  stle1(c0, c2)
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, cst), wa(wss(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1))), wbr(nat1, cle, cfv(c0, c2)), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), cle, cfv(c0, c2)))
  adantrr(wcel(c0, cst), wss(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), cle, cfv(c0, c2)))
  imp(wcel(c0, cst), wss(c1, c2), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), cle, cfv(c0, c2)))
  stlei(c0, c1, c2)
  ad2antll(wcel(c0, cst), wss(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wb(wbr(cfv(c0, c1), cle, cfv(c0, c2)), wbr(nat1, cle, cfv(c0, c2))))
  breq1(cfv(c0, c1), nat1, cle, cfv(c0, c2))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cst), wa(wss(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1))), wb(wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat1), wa(wbr(cfv(c0, c2), cle, nat1), wbr(nat1, cle, cfv(c0, c2)))), wa(wcel(cfv(c0, c2), cr), wcel(nat1, cr)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cst), wa(wss(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1)), wa(wcel(cfv(c0, c2), cr), wcel(nat1, cr)))
  jctir(wcel(c0, cst), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), cr), wcel(nat1, cr))
  mpi(wcel(c0, cst), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), cr), wcel(c2, cch))
  stcl(c0, c2)
  1re()
  letri3(cfv(c0, c2), nat1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm stlesi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ States →(c1 ⊆ c2 →((c0 ` c1)= 1 →(c0 ` c2)= 1)))
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c2 ∈ CH
} = {
  exp32(c0 ∈ States, c1 ⊆ c2, (c0 ` c1)= 1, (c0 ` c2)= 1)
  mpbir2and((c0 ∈ States ∧(c1 ⊆ c2 ∧(c0 ` c1)= 1)), (c0 ` c2)= 1, (c0 ` c2)[≤]1, 1[≤](c0 ` c2))
  adantr(c0 ∈ States, (c1 ⊆ c2 ∧(c0 ` c1)= 1), (c0 ` c2)[≤]1)
  mpi(c0 ∈ States, (c0 ` c2)[≤]1, c2 ∈ CH)
  stle1(c0, c2)
  mpbid((c0 ∈ States ∧(c1 ⊆ c2 ∧(c0 ` c1)= 1)), 1[≤](c0 ` c2), (c0 ` c1)[≤](c0 ` c2))
  adantrr(c0 ∈ States, c1 ⊆ c2, (c0 ` c1)= 1, (c0 ` c1)[≤](c0 ` c2))
  imp(c0 ∈ States, c1 ⊆ c2, (c0 ` c1)[≤](c0 ` c2))
  stlei(c0, c1, c2)
  ad2antll(c0 ∈ States, c1 ⊆ c2, (c0 ` c1)= 1, ((c0 ` c1)[≤](c0 ` c2)↔ 1[≤](c0 ` c2)))
  breq1((c0 ` c1), nat1, cle, (c0 ` c2))
  syl((c0 ∈ States ∧(c1 ⊆ c2 ∧(c0 ` c1)= 1)), ((c0 ` c2)= 1 ↔((c0 ` c2)[≤]1 ∧ 1[≤](c0 ` c2))), ((c0 ` c2)∈ ℝ ∧ 1 ∈ ℝ))
  adantr(c0 ∈ States, (c1 ⊆ c2 ∧(c0 ` c1)= 1), ((c0 ` c2)∈ ℝ ∧ 1 ∈ ℝ))
  jctir(c0 ∈ States, (c0 ` c2)∈ ℝ, 1 ∈ ℝ)
  mpi(c0 ∈ States, (c0 ` c2)∈ ℝ, c2 ∈ CH)
  stcl(c0, c2)
  1re()
  letri3((c0 ` c2), nat1)
}

  -| wcel(c2, cch)
} = {

  pm3.2i(wcel(cfv(cort, c1), cch), wcel(cin(c1, c2), cch))
  choccli(c1)
  mpbi(wss(cfv(cort, c1), cfv(cort, cin(c1, c2))), wss(cin(c1, c2), c1))

}

blocks.name: stm1i
blocks.content: State of component of unit meet. (Contributed by NM, 11-Nov-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm stm1i(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cst), wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cin(c1, c2)), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1)))
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| wcel(c2, cch)
} = {
  sylibd(wcel(c0, cst), wceq(cfv(c0, cin(c1, c2)), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wbr(nat1, cle, cfv(c0, c1)))
  syl5ibcom(wcel(c0, cst), wceq(cfv(c0, cin(c1, c2)), nat1), wbr(nat1, cle, cfv(c0, c1)), wbr(cfv(c0, cin(c1, c2)), cle, cfv(c0, c1)))
  mpi(wcel(c0, cst), wbr(cfv(c0, cin(c1, c2)), cle, cfv(c0, c1)), wss(cin(c1, c2), c1))
  inss1(c1, c2)
  stlei(c0, cin(c1, c2), c1)
  chincli(c1, c2)
  breq1(cfv(c0, cin(c1, c2)), nat1, cle, cfv(c0, c1))
  stge1i(c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm stm1i(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ States →((c0 `(c1 ⋂ c2))= 1 →(c0 ` c1)= 1))
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c2 ∈ CH
} = {
  sylibd(c0 ∈ States, (c0 `(c1 ⋂ c2))= 1, (c0 ` c1)= 1, 1[≤](c0 ` c1))
  syl5ibcom(c0 ∈ States, (c0 `(c1 ⋂ c2))= 1, 1[≤](c0 ` c1), (c0 `(c1 ⋂ c2))[≤](c0 ` c1))
  mpi(c0 ∈ States, (c0 `(c1 ⋂ c2))[≤](c0 ` c1), (c1 ⋂ c2)⊆ c1)
  inss1(c1, c2)
  stlei(c0, (c1 ⋂ c2), c1)
  chincli(c1, c2)
  breq1((c0 `(c1 ⋂ c2)), nat1, cle, (c0 ` c1))
  stge1i(c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: staddi
blocks.content: If the sum of 2 states is 2, then each state is 1. (Contributed by NM, 12-Nov-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm staddi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cst), wi(wceq(co(cfv(c0, c1), caddc, cfv(c0, c2)), nat2), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1)))
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| wcel(c2, cch)
} = {
  3syld(wcel(c0, cst), wceq(co(cfv(c0, c1), caddc, cfv(c0, c2)), nat2), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wn(wbr(co(cfv(c0, c1), caddc, cfv(c0, c2)), clt, nat2)), wn(wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, nat1)))
  necon2bd(co(cfv(c0, c1), caddc, cfv(c0, c2)), nat2, wcel(c0, cst), wbr(co(cfv(c0, c1), caddc, cfv(c0, c2)), clt, nat2))
  ex(wcel(c0, cst), wbr(co(cfv(c0, c1), caddc, cfv(c0, c2)), clt, nat2), wne(co(cfv(c0, c1), caddc, cfv(c0, c2)), nat2))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cst), wbr(co(cfv(c0, c1), caddc, cfv(c0, c2)), clt, nat2), wne(co(cfv(c0, c1), caddc, cfv(c0, c2)), nat2), wcel(co(cfv(c0, c1), caddc, cfv(c0, c2)), cr))
  necomd(co(cfv(c0, c1), caddc, cfv(c0, c2)), nat2, wa(wcel(co(cfv(c0, c1), caddc, cfv(c0, c2)), cr), wbr(co(cfv(c0, c1), caddc, cfv(c0, c2)), clt, nat2)))
  ltne(co(cfv(c0, c1), caddc, cfv(c0, c2)), nat2)
  con3d(wcel(c0, cst), wbr(co(cfv(c0, c1), caddc, cfv(c0, c2)), clt, nat2), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, nat1))
  ex(wcel(c0, cst), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, nat1), wbr(co(cfv(c0, c1), caddc, cfv(c0, c2)), clt, nat2))
  syl6breqr(co(cfv(c0, c1), caddc, cfv(c0, c2)), clt, nat2, co(nat1, caddc, nat1), wa(wcel(c0, cst), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, nat1)))
  mp2and(wa(wcel(c0, cst), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, nat1)), wbr(co(cfv(c0, c1), caddc, cfv(c0, c2)), clt, co(nat1, caddc, nat1)), wbr(co(cfv(c0, c1), caddc, cfv(c0, c2)), cle, co(cfv(c0, c1), caddc, nat1)), wbr(co(cfv(c0, c1), caddc, nat1), clt, co(nat1, caddc, nat1)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cst), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, nat1), wbr(co(cfv(c0, c1), caddc, cfv(c0, c2)), cle, co(cfv(c0, c1), caddc, nat1)))
  leadd2dd(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2), nat1, wcel(c0, cst))
  mpi(wcel(c0, cst), wbr(cfv(c0, c2), cle, nat1), wcel(c2, cch))
  stle1(c0, c2)
  imp(wcel(c0, cst), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, nat1), wbr(co(cfv(c0, c1), caddc, nat1), clt, co(nat1, caddc, nat1)))
  syl3anc(wcel(c0, cst), wi(wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, nat1), wbr(co(cfv(c0, c1), caddc, nat1), clt, co(nat1, caddc, nat1))), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cr), wcel(nat1, cr), wcel(nat1, cr))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cst), wcel(nat1, cr))
  biimpd(w3a(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cr), wcel(nat1, cr), wcel(nat1, cr)), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, nat1), wbr(co(cfv(c0, c1), caddc, nat1), clt, co(nat1, caddc, nat1)))

  diff.hs1.w((s0 ∈ ~H ∧(normh ` s0)= 1))

  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)

  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

}

blocks.name: strlem3
blocks.content: Lemma for strong state theorem: the function ` S ` , that maps a closed subspace to the square of the norm of its projection onto a unit vector, is a state. This lemma restates the hypotheses in a more convenient form to work with. (Contributed by NM, 28-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm strlem3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cst))

  -| wb(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(cno, cv(s1)), nat1)))
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| wcel(c2, cch)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(c0, cst)), wcel(c2, cch))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(c0, cst)), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(c0, cst)), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(c0, cst)), diffsw(s0, w0))
  sylbi(w0, wcel(c0, cst), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(cno, cv(s1)), nat1)))
  sylan(wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(cno, cv(s1)), nat1), wcel(c0, cst), wcel(cv(s1), chba))
  syl(wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s1), chba), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  eldifi(cv(s1), c1, c2)
  cheli(cv(s1), c1)
  strlem3a(s1, s0, c0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

  ⊢ (w0 → ¬((c0 ` c1)= 1 →(c0 ` c2)= 1))

  ltned((c0 ` c2), nat1, w0)
  mpisyl(w0, (c0 ` c2)∈ ℝ, c0 ∈ States, c2 ∈ CH)
  strlem3(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  stcl(c0, c2)
  strlem5(s0, s1, c0, c2, c1, w0)
  annim((c0 ` c1)= 1, (c0 ` c2)= 1)
}

thm stri(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0 ∈ States,((s0 ` c0)= 1 →(s0 ` c1)= 1))→ c0 ⊆ c1)
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  sylbi(∀(s0 ∈ States,((s0 ` c0)= 1 →(s0 ` c1)= 1)), c0 ⊆ c1, ¬ ∃(s0 ∈ States, ¬((s0 ` c0)= 1 →(s0 ` c1)= 1)))
  dfral2(s0, cst, ((s0 ` c0)= 1 →(s0 ` c1)= 1))
  con1i(∃(s0 ∈ States, ¬((s0 ` c0)= 1 →(s0 ` c1)= 1)), c0 ⊆ c1)
  syl(¬ c0 ⊆ c1, ∃(s0 ∈ States, ¬((s0 ` c0)= 1 →(s0 ` c1)= 1)), ∃(hs0 ∈(c0 \ c1),(normh ` hs0)= 1))
  strlem1(hs0, c0, c1)
  rexlimiva(hs0, (c0 \ c1), (normh ` hs0)= 1, ∃(s0 ∈ States, ¬((s0 ` c0)= 1 →(s0 ` c1)= 1)))
  syl2anc((hs0 ∈(c0 \ c1)∧(normh ` hs0)= 1), ∃(s0 ∈ States, ¬((s0 ` c0)= 1 →(s0 ` c1)= 1)), (hs1 ∈ CH ↦((normh `((projh ` hs1)` hs0))[^]2))∈ States, ¬(((hs1 ∈ CH ↦((normh `((projh ` hs1)` hs0))[^]2))` c0)= 1 →((hs1 ∈ CH ↦((normh `((projh ` hs1)` hs0))[^]2))` c1)= 1))
  strlem3(hs1, hs0, (hs1 ∈ CH ↦((normh `((projh ` hs1)` hs0))[^]2)), c0, c1, (hs0 ∈(c0 \ c1)∧(normh ` hs0)= 1))
  strlem6(hs1, hs0, (hs1 ∈ CH ↦((normh `((projh ` hs1)` hs0))[^]2)), c0, c1, (hs0 ∈(c0 \ c1)∧(normh ` hs0)= 1))
  eqid((hs1 ∈ CH ↦((normh `((projh ` hs1)` hs0))[^]2)))
  biid((hs0 ∈(c0 \ c1)∧(normh ` hs0)= 1))
  rspcev(s0, (hs1 ∈ CH ↦((normh `((projh ` hs1)` hs0))[^]2)), cst, ¬(((hs1 ∈ CH ↦((normh `((projh ` hs1)` hs0))[^]2))` c0)= 1 →((hs1 ∈ CH ↦((normh `((projh ` hs1)` hs0))[^]2))` c1)= 1), ¬((s0 ` c0)= 1 →(s0 ` c1)= 1))
  notbid(s0 =(hs1 ∈ CH ↦((normh `((projh ` hs1)` hs0))[^]2)), ((s0 ` c0)= 1 →(s0 ` c1)= 1), (((hs1 ∈ CH ↦((normh `((projh ` hs1)` hs0))[^]2))` c0)= 1 →((hs1 ∈ CH ↦((normh `((projh ` hs1)` hs0))[^]2))` c1)= 1))
  imbi12d(s0 =(hs1 ∈ CH ↦((normh `((projh ` hs1)` hs0))[^]2)), (s0 ` c0)= 1, (s0 ` c1)= 1, ((hs1 ∈ CH ↦((normh `((projh ` hs1)` hs0))[^]2))` c0)= 1, ((hs1 ∈ CH ↦((normh `((projh ` hs1)` hs0))[^]2))` c1)= 1)
  eqeq1d((s0 ` c0), nat1, ((hs1 ∈ CH ↦((normh `((projh ` hs1)` hs0))[^]2))` c0), s0 =(hs1 ∈ CH ↦((normh `((projh ` hs1)` hs0))[^]2)))
  fveq1(s0, (hs1 ∈ CH ↦((normh `((projh ` hs1)` hs0))[^]2)), c0)
  eqeq1d((s0 ` c1), nat1, ((hs1 ∈ CH ↦((normh `((projh ` hs1)` hs0))[^]2))` c1), s0 =(hs1 ∈ CH ↦((normh `((projh ` hs1)` hs0))[^]2)))
  fveq1(s0, (hs1 ∈ CH ↦((normh `((projh ` hs1)` hs0))[^]2)), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(∃(s0 ∈ States, ¬((s0 ` c0)= 1 →(s0 ` c1)= 1)))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.w((hs0 ∈(c0 \ c1)∧(normh ` hs0)= 1))
  diff.cst.s(s0)
  diff.wn.s(s0, (((hs1 ∈ CH ↦((normh `((projh ` hs1)` hs0))[^]2))` c0)= 1 →((hs1 ∈ CH ↦((normh `((projh ` hs1)` hs0))[^]2))` c1)= 1))
  diff.wi.s(s0, ((hs1 ∈ CH ↦((normh `((projh ` hs1)` hs0))[^]2))` c0)= 1, ((hs1 ∈ CH ↦((normh `((projh ` hs1)` hs0))[^]2))` c1)= 1)

  diff.cfv.s(s0, (hs1 ∈ CH ↦((normh `((projh ` hs1)` hs0))[^]2)), c1)
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, hs1, cch, ((normh `((projh ` hs1)` hs0))[^]2))
  diff.cch.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, (normh `((projh ` hs1)` hs0)), cexp, nat2)

  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cexp.s(s0)
  diff.nat2.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: strb
blocks.content: Strong state theorem (bidirectional version). (Contributed by NM, 7-Apr-2001.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm strb(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wral(s0, cst, wi(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c0), nat1), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), nat1))), wss(c0, c1))
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  impbii(wral(s0, cst, wi(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c0), nat1), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), nat1))), wss(c0, c1))
  stri(s0, c0, c1)
  ralrimiv(s0, cst, wss(c0, c1), wi(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c0), nat1), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), nat1)))
  com12(wss(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), cst), wi(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c0), nat1), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), nat1)))
  stlesi(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm strb(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0 ∈ States,((s0 ` c0)= 1 →(s0 ` c1)= 1))↔ c0 ⊆ c1)
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  impbii(∀(s0 ∈ States,((s0 ` c0)= 1 →(s0 ` c1)= 1)), c0 ⊆ c1)
  stri(s0, c0, c1)
  ralrimiv(s0, cst, c0 ⊆ c1, ((s0 ` c0)= 1 →(s0 ` c1)= 1))
  com12(c0 ⊆ c1, s0 ∈ States, ((s0 ` c0)= 1 →(s0 ` c1)= 1))
  stlesi(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: hstrlem2
blocks.content: Lemma for strong set of CH states theorem. (Contributed by NM, 30-Jun-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm hstrlem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cch), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(s0))))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s1, cch, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  fvmpt(s1, c0, cch, c1, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(cpjh, cv(s1)), cv(s0)))
  fveq1d(cfv(cpjh, cv(s1)), cv(s0), cfv(cpjh, c0), wceq(cv(s1), c0))
  fveq2(cv(s1), c0, cpjh)
  fvex(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(s0))
  diff.cch.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(s0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cpjh, c0)
  diff.cpjh.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm hstrlem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ CH →(c1 ` c0)=((projh ` c0)` s0))
  ⊣ c1 =(s1 ∈ CH ↦((projh ` s1)` s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  fvmpt(s1, c0, cch, c1, ((projh ` c0)` s0), ((projh ` s1)` s0))
  fveq1d((projh ` s1), s0, (projh ` c0), s1 = c0)
  fveq2(s1, c0, cpjh)
  fvex((projh ` c0), s0)
  diff.cch.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, (projh ` c0), s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cpjh, c0)
  diff.cpjh.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.content: Lemma for strong set of CH states theorem: the function ` S ` , that maps a closed subspace to the square of the norm of its projection onto a unit vector, is a state. (Contributed by NM, 30-Jun-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm hstrlem3a(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), chba), wceq(cfv(cno, cv(s0)), nat1)), wcel(c0, chst))

  ancoms(wcel(cv(s0), chba), wcel(cv(s1), cch), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), chba))
  pjhcl(cv(s1), cv(s0))
  syl5eq(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, chba)), nat1, cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), chba), wceq(cfv(cno, cv(s0)), nat1)))
  fveq2i(cno, cfv(c0, chba), cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), cv(s0)))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(c0, chba), cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), cv(s0))), wcel(chba, cch))

  fveq2d(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), cv(s0)), cv(s0), wcel(cv(s0), chba))

blocks.name: hstrlem3
blocks.content: Lemma for strong set of CH states theorem: the function ` S ` , that maps a closed subspace to the square of the norm of its projection onto a unit vector, is a state. This lemma restates the hypotheses in a more convenient form to work with. (Contributed by NM, 30-Jun-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm hstrlem3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, chst))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cch, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))
  -| wb(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(cno, cv(s1)), nat1)))
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| wcel(c2, cch)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(c0, chst)), wcel(c2, cch))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(c0, chst)), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(c0, chst)), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(c0, chst)), diffsw(s0, w0))
  sylbi(w0, wcel(c0, chst), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(cno, cv(s1)), nat1)))
  sylan(wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(cno, cv(s1)), nat1), wcel(c0, chst), wcel(cv(s1), chba))
  syl(wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s1), chba), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  eldifi(cv(s1), c1, c2)
  cheli(cv(s1), c1)
  hstrlem3a(s1, s0, c0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm hstrlem3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ CHStates)

  ⊢ (w0 →(normh `(c0 ` c1))= 1)
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ CH ↦((projh ` s0)` s1))
  ⊣ (w0 ↔(s1 ∈(c1 \ c2)∧(normh ` s1)= 1))
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH

  a1ii((w0 →(normh `(c0 ` c1))= 1), d(s0, c2))
  a1ii((w0 →(normh `(c0 ` c1))= 1), d(s0, w0))
  syl5eq((normh `(c0 ` c1)), nat1, (normh `((projh ` c1)` s1)), w0)
  fveq2i(cno, (c0 ` c1), ((projh ` c1)` s1))
  ax-mp((c0 ` c1)=((projh ` c1)` s1), c1 ∈ CH)
  hstrlem2(s1, s0, c1, c0)
  sylbi(w0, (normh `((projh ` c1)` s1))= 1, (s1 ∈(c1 \ c2)∧(normh ` s1)= 1))
  mpan9(s1 ∈(c1 \ c2), (normh ` s1)= 1, (normh `((projh ` c1)` s1))= 1, s1 ∈ c1)
  eldifi(s1, c1, c2)
  syl5ib((normh ` s1)= 1, s1 ∈ c1, (normh `((projh ` c1)` s1))= 1, (normh `((projh ` c1)` s1))=(normh ` s1))
  fveq2d(cno, ((projh ` c1)` s1), s1, s1 ∈ c1)
  mpan(s1 ∈ c1, ((projh ` c1)` s1)= s1, c1 ∈ CH)
  pjid(c1, s1)
  eqeq2((normh ` s1), nat1, (normh `((projh ` c1)` s1)))

thm hstrlem5(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, c1)), clt, nat1))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cch, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))
  -| wb(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c2, c1)), wceq(cfv(cno, cv(s1)), nat1)))
  -| wcel(c2, cch)
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, c1)), clt, nat1)), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, c1)), clt, nat1)), diffsw(s0, w0))
  sylbi(w0, wbr(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, c1)), clt, nat1), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c2, c1)), wceq(cfv(cno, cv(s1)), nat1)))
  syl5eqbr(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, c1)), clt, nat1, cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c2, c1)), wceq(cfv(cno, cv(s1)), nat1)))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cv(s1)))), wcel(c1, cch))
  fveq2d(cno, cfv(c0, c1), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cv(s1)), wcel(c1, cch))
  hstrlem2(s1, s0, c1, c0)
  impcom(wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c2, c1)), wceq(cfv(cno, cv(s1)), nat1), wbr(cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cv(s1))), clt, nat1))
  syl5ib(wceq(cfv(cno, cv(s1)), nat1), wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c2, c1)), wbr(cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cv(s1))), clt, nat1), wbr(cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cv(s1))), clt, cfv(cno, cv(s1))))
  sylbi(wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c2, c1)), wbr(cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cv(s1))), clt, cfv(cno, cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wn(wcel(cv(s1), c1))))
  eldif(cv(s1), c2, c1)
  sylan(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wn(wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wbr(cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cv(s1))), clt, cfv(cno, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s1), chba))
  cheli(cv(s1), c2)
  biimpa(wcel(cv(s1), chba), wn(wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wbr(cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cv(s1))), clt, cfv(cno, cv(s1))))
  mpan(wcel(cv(s1), chba), wb(wn(wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wbr(cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cv(s1))), clt, cfv(cno, cv(s1)))), wcel(c1, cch))
  pjnel(c1, cv(s1))
  breq2(cfv(cno, cv(s1)), nat1, cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cv(s1))), clt)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm hstrlem5(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(normh `(c0 ` c1))[<]1)
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ CH ↦((projh ` s0)` s1))
  ⊣ (w0 ↔(s1 ∈(c2 \ c1)∧(normh ` s1)= 1))
  ⊣ c2 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 →(normh `(c0 ` c1))[<]1), d(s0, c2))
  a1ii((w0 →(normh `(c0 ` c1))[<]1), d(s0, w0))
  sylbi(w0, (normh `(c0 ` c1))[<]1, (s1 ∈(c2 \ c1)∧(normh ` s1)= 1))
  syl5eqbr((normh `(c0 ` c1)), clt, nat1, (normh `((projh ` c1)` s1)), (s1 ∈(c2 \ c1)∧(normh ` s1)= 1))
  ax-mp((normh `(c0 ` c1))=(normh `((projh ` c1)` s1)), c1 ∈ CH)
  fveq2d(cno, (c0 ` c1), ((projh ` c1)` s1), c1 ∈ CH)
  hstrlem2(s1, s0, c1, c0)
  impcom(s1 ∈(c2 \ c1), (normh ` s1)= 1, (normh `((projh ` c1)` s1))[<]1)
  syl5ib((normh ` s1)= 1, s1 ∈(c2 \ c1), (normh `((projh ` c1)` s1))[<]1, (normh `((projh ` c1)` s1))[<](normh ` s1))
  sylbi(s1 ∈(c2 \ c1), (normh `((projh ` c1)` s1))[<](normh ` s1), (s1 ∈ c2 ∧ ¬ s1 ∈ c1))
  eldif(s1, c2, c1)
  sylan(s1 ∈ c2, ¬ s1 ∈ c1, (normh `((projh ` c1)` s1))[<](normh ` s1), s1 ∈ ~H)
  cheli(s1, c2)
  biimpa(s1 ∈ ~H, ¬ s1 ∈ c1, (normh `((projh ` c1)` s1))[<](normh ` s1))
  mpan(s1 ∈ ~H, (¬ s1 ∈ c1 ↔(normh `((projh ` c1)` s1))[<](normh ` s1)), c1 ∈ CH)
  pjnel(c1, s1)
  breq2((normh ` s1), nat1, (normh `((projh ` c1)` s1)), clt)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

}

thm hstri(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0 ∈ CHStates,((normh `(s0 ` c0))= 1 →(normh `(s0 ` c1))= 1))→ c0 ⊆ c1)
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  sylbi(∀(s0 ∈ CHStates,((normh `(s0 ` c0))= 1 →(normh `(s0 ` c1))= 1)), c0 ⊆ c1, ¬ ∃(s0 ∈ CHStates, ¬((normh `(s0 ` c0))= 1 →(normh `(s0 ` c1))= 1)))
  dfral2(s0, chst, ((normh `(s0 ` c0))= 1 →(normh `(s0 ` c1))= 1))
  con1i(∃(s0 ∈ CHStates, ¬((normh `(s0 ` c0))= 1 →(normh `(s0 ` c1))= 1)), c0 ⊆ c1)
  syl(¬ c0 ⊆ c1, ∃(s0 ∈ CHStates, ¬((normh `(s0 ` c0))= 1 →(normh `(s0 ` c1))= 1)), ∃(hs0 ∈(c0 \ c1),(normh ` hs0)= 1))
  strlem1(hs0, c0, c1)
  rexlimiva(hs0, (c0 \ c1), (normh ` hs0)= 1, ∃(s0 ∈ CHStates, ¬((normh `(s0 ` c0))= 1 →(normh `(s0 ` c1))= 1)))
  syl2anc((hs0 ∈(c0 \ c1)∧(normh ` hs0)= 1), ∃(s0 ∈ CHStates, ¬((normh `(s0 ` c0))= 1 →(normh `(s0 ` c1))= 1)), (hs1 ∈ CH ↦((projh ` hs1)` hs0))∈ CHStates, ¬((normh `((hs1 ∈ CH ↦((projh ` hs1)` hs0))` c0))= 1 →(normh `((hs1 ∈ CH ↦((projh ` hs1)` hs0))` c1))= 1))
  hstrlem3(hs1, hs0, (hs1 ∈ CH ↦((projh ` hs1)` hs0)), c0, c1, (hs0 ∈(c0 \ c1)∧(normh ` hs0)= 1))
  hstrlem6(hs1, hs0, (hs1 ∈ CH ↦((projh ` hs1)` hs0)), c0, c1, (hs0 ∈(c0 \ c1)∧(normh ` hs0)= 1))
  eqid((hs1 ∈ CH ↦((projh ` hs1)` hs0)))
  biid((hs0 ∈(c0 \ c1)∧(normh ` hs0)= 1))
  rspcev(s0, (hs1 ∈ CH ↦((projh ` hs1)` hs0)), chst, ¬((normh `((hs1 ∈ CH ↦((projh ` hs1)` hs0))` c0))= 1 →(normh `((hs1 ∈ CH ↦((projh ` hs1)` hs0))` c1))= 1), ¬((normh `(s0 ` c0))= 1 →(normh `(s0 ` c1))= 1))
  notbid(s0 =(hs1 ∈ CH ↦((projh ` hs1)` hs0)), ((normh `(s0 ` c0))= 1 →(normh `(s0 ` c1))= 1), ((normh `((hs1 ∈ CH ↦((projh ` hs1)` hs0))` c0))= 1 →(normh `((hs1 ∈ CH ↦((projh ` hs1)` hs0))` c1))= 1))
  imbi12d(s0 =(hs1 ∈ CH ↦((projh ` hs1)` hs0)), (normh `(s0 ` c0))= 1, (normh `(s0 ` c1))= 1, (normh `((hs1 ∈ CH ↦((projh ` hs1)` hs0))` c0))= 1, (normh `((hs1 ∈ CH ↦((projh ` hs1)` hs0))` c1))= 1)
  fveqeq2d(cno, (s0 ` c0), nat1, ((hs1 ∈ CH ↦((projh ` hs1)` hs0))` c0), s0 =(hs1 ∈ CH ↦((projh ` hs1)` hs0)))
  fveq1(s0, (hs1 ∈ CH ↦((projh ` hs1)` hs0)), c0)
  fveqeq2d(cno, (s0 ` c1), nat1, ((hs1 ∈ CH ↦((projh ` hs1)` hs0))` c1), s0 =(hs1 ∈ CH ↦((projh ` hs1)` hs0)))
  fveq1(s0, (hs1 ∈ CH ↦((projh ` hs1)` hs0)), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(∃(s0 ∈ CHStates, ¬((normh `(s0 ` c0))= 1 →(normh `(s0 ` c1))= 1)))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.w((hs0 ∈(c0 \ c1)∧(normh ` hs0)= 1))
  diff.chst.s(s0)
  diff.wn.s(s0, ((normh `((hs1 ∈ CH ↦((projh ` hs1)` hs0))` c0))= 1 →(normh `((hs1 ∈ CH ↦((projh ` hs1)` hs0))` c1))= 1))
  diff.wi.s(s0, (normh `((hs1 ∈ CH ↦((projh ` hs1)` hs0))` c0))= 1, (normh `((hs1 ∈ CH ↦((projh ` hs1)` hs0))` c1))= 1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, (normh `((hs1 ∈ CH ↦((projh ` hs1)` hs0))` c0)), nat1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cno, ((hs1 ∈ CH ↦((projh ` hs1)` hs0))` c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, (hs1 ∈ CH ↦((projh ` hs1)` hs0)), c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, (normh `((hs1 ∈ CH ↦((projh ` hs1)` hs0))` c1)), nat1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cno, ((hs1 ∈ CH ↦((projh ` hs1)` hs0))` c1))
  diff.cno.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, (hs1 ∈ CH ↦((projh ` hs1)` hs0)), c1)
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, hs1, cch, ((projh ` hs1)` hs0))
  diff.cch.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, (projh ` hs1), hs0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cpjh, hs1)
  diff.cpjh.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: hstrbi
blocks.content: Strong CH-state theorem (bidirectional version). Theorem in [Mayet3] p. 10 and its converse. (Contributed by NM, 30-Jun-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm hstrbi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wral(s0, chst, wi(wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(cv(s0), c0)), nat1), wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(cv(s0), c1)), nat1))), wss(c0, c1))
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  impbii(wral(s0, chst, wi(wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(cv(s0), c0)), nat1), wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(cv(s0), c1)), nat1))), wss(c0, c1))
  hstri(s0, c0, c1)
  ralrimiv(s0, chst, wss(c0, c1), wi(wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(cv(s0), c0)), nat1), wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(cv(s0), c1)), nat1)))
  expcom(wss(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), chst), wi(wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(cv(s0), c0)), nat1), wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(cv(s0), c1)), nat1)))
  mpanl2(wcel(cv(s0), chst), wss(c0, c1), wi(wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(cv(s0), c0)), nat1), wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(cv(s0), c1)), nat1)), wcel(c0, cch))
  mpanr1(wa(wcel(cv(s0), chst), wcel(c0, cch)), wss(c0, c1), wi(wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(cv(s0), c0)), nat1), wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(cv(s0), c1)), nat1)), wcel(c1, cch))
  hstles(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm hstrbi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0 ∈ CHStates,((normh `(s0 ` c0))= 1 →(normh `(s0 ` c1))= 1))↔ c0 ⊆ c1)
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  impbii(∀(s0 ∈ CHStates,((normh `(s0 ` c0))= 1 →(normh `(s0 ` c1))= 1)), c0 ⊆ c1)
  hstri(s0, c0, c1)
  ralrimiv(s0, chst, c0 ⊆ c1, ((normh `(s0 ` c0))= 1 →(normh `(s0 ` c1))= 1))
  expcom(c0 ⊆ c1, s0 ∈ CHStates, ((normh `(s0 ` c0))= 1 →(normh `(s0 ` c1))= 1))
  mpanl2(s0 ∈ CHStates, c0 ⊆ c1, ((normh `(s0 ` c0))= 1 →(normh `(s0 ` c1))= 1), c0 ∈ CH)
  mpanr1((s0 ∈ CHStates ∧ c0 ∈ CH), c0 ⊆ c1, ((normh `(s0 ` c0))= 1 →(normh `(s0 ` c1))= 1), c1 ∈ CH)
  hstles(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: largei
blocks.content: A Hilbert lattice admits a largei set of states. Remark in [Mayet] p. 370. (Contributed by NM, 7-Apr-2001.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm largei(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wb(wn(wceq(c0, c0h)), wrex(s0, cst, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c0), nat1)))
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  con1bii(wceq(c0, c0h), wrex(s0, cst, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c0), nat1)))
  bitr3i(wn(wrex(s0, cst, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c0), nat1))), wceq(c0, c0h), wral(s0, cst, wn(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c0), nat1))))
  ralnex(s0, cst, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c0), nat1))
  3bitri(wral(s0, cst, wn(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c0), nat1))), wceq(c0, c0h), wral(s0, cst, wi(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c0), nat1), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c0h), nat1))), wss(c0, c0h))
  ralbiia(s0, cst, wn(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c0), nat1)), wi(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c0), nat1), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c0h), nat1)))
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), cst), wb(wn(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c0), nat1)), wi(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c0), nat1), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c0h), nat1))), wn(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c0h), nat1)))
  mtbiri(wcel(cv(s0), cst), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c0h), nat1), wceq(nat1, nat0))
  neii(nat1, nat0)
  ax-1ne0()
  syl6bb(wcel(cv(s0), cst), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c0h), nat1), wceq(nat1, nat0), wceq(nat0, nat1))
  eqeq1d(cfv(cv(s0), c0h), nat1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), cst))
  st0(cv(s0))
  eqcom(nat0, nat1)
  mtt(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c0h), nat1), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c0), nat1))
  strb(s0, c0, c0h)
  h0elch()
  chle0i(c0)
  diff.c0h.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm largei(setvar s0, class c0) {
  ⊢ (¬ c0 = 0H ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ States,(s0 ` c0)= 1))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  con1bii(c0 = 0H, ∃(s0 ∈ States,(s0 ` c0)= 1))
  bitr3i(¬ ∃(s0 ∈ States,(s0 ` c0)= 1), c0 = 0H, ∀(s0 ∈ States, ¬(s0 ` c0)= 1))
  ralnex(s0, cst, (s0 ` c0)= 1)
  3bitri(∀(s0 ∈ States, ¬(s0 ` c0)= 1), c0 = 0H, ∀(s0 ∈ States,((s0 ` c0)= 1 →(s0 ` 0H)= 1)), c0 ⊆ 0H)
  ralbiia(s0, cst, ¬(s0 ` c0)= 1, ((s0 ` c0)= 1 →(s0 ` 0H)= 1))
  syl(s0 ∈ States, (¬(s0 ` c0)= 1 ↔((s0 ` c0)= 1 →(s0 ` 0H)= 1)), ¬(s0 ` 0H)= 1)
  mtbiri(s0 ∈ States, (s0 ` 0H)= 1, 1 = 0)
  neii(nat1, nat0)
  ax-1ne0()
  syl6bb(s0 ∈ States, (s0 ` 0H)= 1, 1 = 0, 0 = 1)
  eqeq1d((s0 ` 0H), nat1, nat0, s0 ∈ States)
  st0(s0)
  eqcom(nat0, nat1)
  mtt((s0 ` 0H)= 1, (s0 ` c0)= 1)
  strb(s0, c0, c0h)
  h0elch()
  chle0i(c0)
  diff.c0h.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: jplem1
blocks.content: Lemma for Jauch-Piron theorem. (Contributed by NM, 8-Apr-2001.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm jplem1(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), chba), wceq(cfv(cno, cv(s0)), nat1)), wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(co(cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(s0))), cexp, nat2), nat1)))
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
} = {
  bitr4d(wa(wcel(cv(s0), chba), wceq(cfv(cno, cv(s0)), nat1)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(co(cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(s0))), cexp, nat2), nat1), wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(s0))), nat1))
  sylan9bb(wcel(cv(s0), chba), wceq(cfv(cno, cv(s0)), nat1), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(s0))), nat1), wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(s0))), cfv(cno, cv(s0))))
  mpan(wcel(cv(s0), chba), wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(s0))), cfv(cno, cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, cch))
  pjnorm2(c0, cv(s0))
  eqeq2(cfv(cno, cv(s0)), nat1, cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(s0))))
  adantr(wcel(cv(s0), chba), wceq(cfv(cno, cv(s0)), nat1), wb(wceq(co(cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(s0))), cexp, nat2), nat1), wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(s0))), nat1)))
  syl5bbr(wcel(cv(s0), chba), wceq(co(cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(s0))), cexp, nat2), nat1), wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(s0))), nat1), wceq(co(cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(s0))), cexp, nat2), co(nat1, cexp, nat2)))
  eqeq2i(co(cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(s0))), cexp, nat2), co(nat1, cexp, nat2), nat1)
  sq1()
  syl2anc(wcel(cv(s0), chba), wb(wceq(co(cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(s0))), cexp, nat2), co(nat1, cexp, nat2)), wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(s0))), nat1)), wcel(cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(s0))), cr), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(s0)))))
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), chba), wcel(cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(s0))), cr), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(s0)), chba))
  normcl(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(s0)))
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), chba), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(s0)))), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(s0)), chba))
  pjhcli(cv(s0), c0)
  normge0(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(s0)))
  mpanr12(wa(wcel(cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(s0))), cr), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(s0))))), wb(wceq(co(cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(s0))), cexp, nat2), co(nat1, cexp, nat2)), wceq(cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(s0))), nat1)), wcel(nat1, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, nat1))
  1re()
  0le1()
  sq11(cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(s0))), nat1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm jplem1(setvar s0, class c0) {
  ⊢ ((s0 ∈ ~H ∧(normh ` s0)= 1)→(s0 ∈ c0 ↔((normh `((projh ` c0)` s0))[^]2)= 1))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
} = {
  bitr4d((s0 ∈ ~H ∧(normh ` s0)= 1), s0 ∈ c0, ((normh `((projh ` c0)` s0))[^]2)= 1, (normh `((projh ` c0)` s0))= 1)
  sylan9bb(s0 ∈ ~H, (normh ` s0)= 1, s0 ∈ c0, (normh `((projh ` c0)` s0))= 1, (normh `((projh ` c0)` s0))=(normh ` s0))
  mpan(s0 ∈ ~H, (s0 ∈ c0 ↔(normh `((projh ` c0)` s0))=(normh ` s0)), c0 ∈ CH)
  pjnorm2(c0, s0)
  eqeq2((normh ` s0), nat1, (normh `((projh ` c0)` s0)))
  adantr(s0 ∈ ~H, (normh ` s0)= 1, (((normh `((projh ` c0)` s0))[^]2)= 1 ↔(normh `((projh ` c0)` s0))= 1))
  syl5bbr(s0 ∈ ~H, ((normh `((projh ` c0)` s0))[^]2)= 1, (normh `((projh ` c0)` s0))= 1, ((normh `((projh ` c0)` s0))[^]2)=(1[^]2))
  eqeq2i(((normh `((projh ` c0)` s0))[^]2), (1[^]2), nat1)
  sq1()
  syl2anc(s0 ∈ ~H, (((normh `((projh ` c0)` s0))[^]2)=(1[^]2)↔(normh `((projh ` c0)` s0))= 1), (normh `((projh ` c0)` s0))∈ ℝ, 0[≤](normh `((projh ` c0)` s0)))
  syl(s0 ∈ ~H, (normh `((projh ` c0)` s0))∈ ℝ, ((projh ` c0)` s0)∈ ~H)
  normcl(((projh ` c0)` s0))
  syl(s0 ∈ ~H, 0[≤](normh `((projh ` c0)` s0)), ((projh ` c0)` s0)∈ ~H)
  pjhcli(s0, c0)
  normge0(((projh ` c0)` s0))
  mpanr12(((normh `((projh ` c0)` s0))∈ ℝ ∧ 0[≤](normh `((projh ` c0)` s0))), (((normh `((projh ` c0)` s0))[^]2)=(1[^]2)↔(normh `((projh ` c0)` s0))= 1), 1 ∈ ℝ, 0[≤]1)
  1re()
  0le1()
  sq11((normh `((projh ` c0)` s0)), nat1)
}

blocks.name: jplem2
blocks.content: Lemma for Jauch-Piron theorem. (Contributed by NM, 8-Apr-2001.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: jpi
blocks.content: The function ` S ` , that maps a closed subspace to the square of the norm of its projection onto a unit vector, is a Jauch-Piron state. Remark in [Mayet] p. 370. (See ~ strlem3a for the proof that ` S ` is a state.) (Contributed by NM, 8-Apr-2001.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm jpi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), chba), wceq(cfv(cno, cv(s0)), nat1)), wb(wa(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat1)), wceq(cfv(c0, cin(c1, c2)), nat1)))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, cch, co(cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cv(s1)), cv(s0))), cexp, nat2)))
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| wcel(c2, cch)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitr3d(wa(wcel(cv(s0), chba), wceq(cfv(cno, cv(s0)), nat1)), wa(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat1)), wceq(cfv(c0, cin(c1, c2)), nat1), wcel(cv(s0), cin(c1, c2)))
  syl5bb(wa(wcel(cv(s0), chba), wceq(cfv(cno, cv(s0)), nat1)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(c1, c2)), wa(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  elin(cv(s0), c1, c2)
  anbi12d(wa(wcel(cv(s0), chba), wceq(cfv(cno, cv(s0)), nat1)), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat1))
  jplem2(s0, s1, c1, c0)
  jplem2(s0, s1, c2, c0)
  jplem2(s0, s1, cin(c1, c2), c0)
  chincli(c1, c2)
  diff.cin.s(s1, c1, c2)
}
